Gem_C_Sharp.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory fires {0} arrows that deal {1} <color=yellow>damage</color> to random enemies.
Gem_C_Sharp.description: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory fires 5 arrows that deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>90%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to random enemies.
Gem_C_Sharp.name: Essence of Sharpness

Gem_E_Flexibility.rawDesc: While this Memory is on <color=yellow>cooldown</color>, {0} of damage taken is <color=yellow>split</color> over {1} seconds. This <color=yellow>split</color> damage is reduced by {2}.
Gem_E_Flexibility.description: While this Memory is on <color=yellow>cooldown</color>, 37%<sprite=5> of damage taken is <color=yellow>split</color> over 4 seconds. This <color=yellow>split</color> damage is reduced by 20%.
Gem_E_Flexibility.name: Essence of Flexibility

Gem_C_Lethality.rawDesc: This Memory's damage against enemies with {0} or more Health is increased by {1}.
Gem_C_Lethality.description: This Memory's damage against enemies with 70% or more Health is increased by 60%<sprite=5>.
Gem_C_Lethality.name: Essence of Lethality

Gem_U_LastStarlight.rawDesc:
Every {0} seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>Cast</color> is <color=yellow>Empowered</color>. On an <color=yellow>Empowered Cast</color>, create a black hole at the cast location that deals {1} <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> per second for {2} seconds. 
If this is not a location-targeted Memory, the black hole is created on the nearest enemy in the direction you are facing.
Gem_U_LastStarlight.description:
Every 15 seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>Cast</color> is <color=yellow>Empowered</color>. On an <color=yellow>Empowered Cast</color>, create a black hole at the cast location that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>160%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> per second for 5 seconds. 
If this is not a location-targeted Memory, the black hole is created on the nearest enemy in the direction you are facing.
Gem_U_LastStarlight.name: Last Starlight
Gem_U_LastStarlight.lore:
My eternal companion, Nyx... 
I devote my very last to you. 
All I ask is that you remain the most radiant goddess of the night...

...Please, just be happy.

Gem_U_EternalFlame.rawDesc:
Dealing <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to an enemy with this Memory inflicts the <color=yellow>Eternal Flame</color> curse for {0} seconds. While under <color=yellow>Eternal Flame</color>, <color=yellow>any damage</color> you deal applies 1 <color=yellow>Burn</color> stack to the target.
All damage from this Memory is increased by {1} for each <color=yellow>Burn</color> stack on that enemy.
Gem_U_EternalFlame.description:
Dealing <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to an enemy with this Memory inflicts the <color=yellow>Eternal Flame</color> curse for 5 seconds. While under <color=yellow>Eternal Flame</color>, <color=yellow>any damage</color> you deal applies 1 <color=yellow>Burn</color> stack to the target.
All damage from this Memory is increased by 2.0%<sprite=5> for each <color=yellow>Burn</color> stack on that enemy.
Gem_U_EternalFlame.name: Eternal Flame

Gem_R_Composure.rawDesc: Casting this Memory increases your <color=yellow>Critical Strike Chance</color> by {0} for {1} seconds. This effect ends early if you take damage from enemies.
Gem_R_Composure.description: Casting this Memory increases your <color=yellow>Critical Strike Chance</color> by 30%<sprite=5> for 5 seconds. This effect ends early if you take damage from enemies.
Gem_R_Composure.name: Essence of Composure

Gem_R_Stillness.rawDesc: Every {0} seconds, this memory's <color=yellow>Cast</color> becomes <color=yellow>Enhanced</color>. Upon <color=yellow>Enhanced Cast</color>, emit light that deals {1} <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>Stuns</color> them for {2} seconds. Higher quality increases the emission radius.
Gem_R_Stillness.description: Every 5 seconds, this memory's <color=yellow>Cast</color> becomes <color=yellow>Enhanced</color>. Upon <color=yellow>Enhanced Cast</color>, emit light that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>Stuns</color> them for 2 seconds. Higher quality increases the emission radius.
Gem_R_Stillness.name: Essence of Stillness

Gem_E_Domination.rawDesc: Increases <color=yellow>Critical Strike Chance</color> by {0}. Each time you land a critical strike on an enemy, your <color=yellow>Critical Strike Damage</color> increases by {1}, stacking up to {2}.
Gem_E_Domination.description: Increases <color=yellow>Critical Strike Chance</color> by 20%. Each time you land a critical strike on an enemy, your <color=yellow>Critical Strike Damage</color> increases by 0.3%, stacking up to 20%<sprite=5>.
Gem_E_Domination.name: Essence of Domination

Gem_R_Momentum.rawDesc: Each time you <color=yellow>attack</color> an enemy, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>reduced</color> by {0} seconds.
Gem_R_Momentum.description: Each time you <color=yellow>attack</color> an enemy, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>reduced</color> by 0.4<sprite=5> seconds.
Gem_R_Momentum.name: Essence of Momentum

Gem_C_Responsibility.rawDesc: Every {0} seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>cast</color> is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. {1} seconds after the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color>, it deals {2} <color=yellow>damage</color> divided among all enemies hit by that cast.
Gem_C_Responsibility.description: Every 10 seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>cast</color> is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. 1.2 seconds after the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color>, it deals <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>400%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> divided among all enemies hit by that cast.
Gem_C_Responsibility.name: Essence of Responsibility

Gem_L_ChaosApple.rawDesc: Each time you <color=yellow>move</color> through a <color=yellow>Rift</color>, this Memory is temporarily <color=yellow>transformed</color> into a different random Memory. The <color=yellow>transformed</color> Memory has no <color=yellow>cooldown</color>, but can only be <color=yellow>cast</color> {0} times per room, and returns to the original Memory when all casts are used.
Gem_L_ChaosApple.description: Each time you <color=yellow>move</color> through a <color=yellow>Rift</color>, this Memory is temporarily <color=yellow>transformed</color> into a different random Memory. The <color=yellow>transformed</color> Memory has no <color=yellow>cooldown</color>, but can only be <color=yellow>cast</color> 4<sprite=5> times per room, and returns to the original Memory when all casts are used.
Gem_L_ChaosApple.name: Apple of Discord

Gem_E_Might.rawDesc: Increases Maximum Health by {0}. This Memory's damage increases by {1} for every {2} points of your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color>.
Gem_E_Might.description: Increases Maximum Health by 260<sprite=5>. This Memory's damage increases by 1% for every 50 points of your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color>.
Gem_E_Might.name: Essence of the Giant

Gem_L_SolarEye.rawDesc: Every {0} seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>cast</color> is <color=yellow>empowered</color>, raining <color=yellow>Solar Light</color> on all nearby enemies who are <color=yellow>burning</color>. <color=yellow>Solar Light</color> deals {1} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> over {2} seconds and increases <color=yellow>Burn</color> stacks by {3}. Increases your Fire damage over time by {4}.
Gem_L_SolarEye.description: Every 20 seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>cast</color> is <color=yellow>empowered</color>, raining <color=yellow>Solar Light</color> on all nearby enemies who are <color=yellow>burning</color>. <color=yellow>Solar Light</color> deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>360%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> over 1.5 seconds and increases <color=yellow>Burn</color> stacks by 9<sprite=5>. Increases your Fire damage over time by 100%.
Gem_L_SolarEye.name: Eye of the Sun

Gem_C_Shatter.rawDesc: Every {0} seconds, the <color=yellow>cast</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. Damage dealt to enemies by the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> is increased by {1}. If it deals <color=yellow>Light damage</color>, it is increased by {2} instead.
Gem_C_Shatter.description: Every 10 seconds, the <color=yellow>cast</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. Damage dealt to enemies by the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> is increased by 40%<sprite=5>. If it deals <color=yellow>Light damage</color>, it is increased by 72%<sprite=5> instead.
Gem_C_Shatter.name: Essence of Shatter
Gem_C_Shatter.lore:
As a collector of stories, I simply gather tales. My role and my destiny are to follow a predetermined path from beginning to end. Just as Sisyphus in the old legend came to love his boulder, I have accepted my fate as well.

But you have always been different. You refuse to let your story follow the path set out for you. Whenever I hear you say, "Just because we were born this way does not mean we must live only that way," I feel a small crack forming in my storybook.

Do not misunderstand. This crack is not unpleasant. In fact, it fascinates me. Among the countless stories racing toward their fixed endings, yours is the only one whose next page I cannot predict.

I am eager to see what ending your stubborn defiance will bring. That final chapter may become the most treasured piece in my entire collection.

Gem_L_DivineFaith.rawDesc: Each time you <color=yellow>kill</color> an enemy with this Memory, gain a stack of <color=yellow>Faith</color> up to {0} stacks. For each stack of <color=yellow>Faith</color>, this Memory's <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>healing</color> to allies increases by {1}, and your Maximum Health increases by {2}.
Gem_L_DivineFaith.description: Each time you <color=yellow>kill</color> an enemy with this Memory, gain a stack of <color=yellow>Faith</color> up to 75<sprite=5> stacks. For each stack of <color=yellow>Faith</color>, this Memory's <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>healing</color> to allies increases by 0.5%, and your Maximum Health increases by 4.
Gem_L_DivineFaith.name: Divine Faith
Gem_L_DivineFaith.lore:
Ignorant and irreverent souls who worship a false god and cling to heretical doctrines. Your blasphemy shall be tolerated no longer.

My mace is the instrument of truth, and my knights bear the calling of the divine. Upon the faithless, judgment shall be delivered.

Tomorrow, the flames of purification shall consume you. Nowhere in this world shall even a trace of their breath remain.

All shall unfold according to the will of El'pyros, Lord of All Creation...

Gem_L_CamillasGift.rawDesc: Can be <color=yellow>sold</color> at the shop for {0} Gold. The <color=yellow>price</color> <color=yellow>increases</color> by {1} each time you move to a next world. It breaks if your Health drops below {2} from enemy damage.
Gem_L_CamillasGift.description: Can be <color=yellow>sold</color> at the shop for 0 Gold. The <color=yellow>price</color> <color=yellow>increases</color> by 0 each time you move to a next world. It breaks if your Health drops below 50% from enemy damage.
Gem_L_CamillasGift.name: Camilla's Gift

Gem_E_Insight.rawDesc: When this Memory deals any <color=yellow>damage</color> to an enemy, it deals an additional {0} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to up to {1} enemies and increases <color=yellow>Memory Haste</color> by {2} for {3} seconds. Can only trigger once every {4} seconds.
Gem_E_Insight.description: When this Memory deals any <color=yellow>damage</color> to an enemy, it deals an additional <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to up to 3<sprite=5> enemies and increases <color=yellow>Memory Haste</color> by 20<sprite=5> for 5 seconds. Can only trigger once every 3 seconds.
Gem_E_Insight.name: Essence of Insight

Gem_C_Efficiency.rawDesc: This Memory gains {0} <color=yellow>Memory Haste</color>, reducing its <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by {1}.
Gem_C_Efficiency.description: This Memory gains 36<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Memory Haste</color>, reducing its <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by 26%<sprite=5>.
Gem_C_Efficiency.name: Essence of Efficiency

Gem_C_Void.rawDesc: After casting this Memory, your next <color=yellow>attack</color> within {0} seconds explodes, dealing {1} <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> to the target and nearby enemies.
Gem_C_Void.description: After casting this Memory, your next <color=yellow>attack</color> within 4 seconds explodes, dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>150%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> to the target and nearby enemies.
Gem_C_Void.name: Essence of the Void
Gem_C_Void.lore:
At the tip of the hollow puppet's blade,
a faint dark energy gathers.

It is not preparation for the next strike.
It is merely a manifestation of emptiness,
revealing the nothingness within.

Paradoxically,
the puppet's sword cuts through enemies
with sharper, more explosive force.

Like a fleeting struggle
toward a void that can never be filled.

Gem_C_Love.rawDesc: When this Memory <color=yellow>restores</color> <color=yellow>Health</color> or grants a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> to an ally, their <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> and <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> increase by {0} for {1} seconds.The effect is reduced by {2} when applied to yourself.
Gem_C_Love.description: When this Memory <color=yellow>restores</color> <color=yellow>Health</color> or grants a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> to an ally, their <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> and <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> increase by 16%<sprite=5> for 2 seconds.The effect is reduced by 50% when applied to yourself.
Gem_C_Love.name: Essence of Love
Gem_C_Love.lore:
Merely an illusion, you say?
...

Is all of this just a pointless fantasy?

...
...
No.

My light, my love, Kiara.
Eternal guide of my soul.
It cannot be so.
A reality without you has no meaning.

Who dares distinguish between illusion and reality?
That line...
Shall vanish today.

Gem_R_Dusk.rawDesc: Casting this Memory fires {0} <color=yellow>Dusk shards</color> that deal {1} <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> each time you <color=yellow>attack</color> an enemy for {2} seconds.
Gem_R_Dusk.description: Casting this Memory fires 2 <color=yellow>Dusk shards</color> that deal <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>30%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> each time you <color=yellow>attack</color> an enemy for 5 seconds.
Gem_R_Dusk.name: Essence of Dusk

Gem_E_Clemency.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Restore</color> <color=yellow>your</color> Health for {0} of the <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by this Memory.
Gem_E_Clemency.description: <color=yellow>Restore</color> <color=yellow>your</color> Health for 4%<sprite=5> of the <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by this Memory.
Gem_E_Clemency.name: Essence of Clemency

Gem_E_Reflex.rawDesc: When you take any <color=yellow>damage</color>, unleash cold toward the nearest enemy, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Cold Damage</color> and knocking them back, then increase your <color=yellow>Armor</color> by {1} for {2} seconds.
Gem_E_Reflex.description: When you take any <color=yellow>damage</color>, unleash cold toward the nearest enemy, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>120%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold Damage</color> and knocking them back, then increase your <color=yellow>Armor</color> by 40<sprite=5> for 1.5 seconds.
Gem_E_Reflex.name: Essence of Reflex

Gem_R_Abyss.rawDesc: Converts all <color=yellow>Damage</color> dealt by this memory to <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color>. If the target hit by this memory has {0} or more stacks of <color=yellow>Darkness</color>, triggers <color=yellow>Attack Effects</color> with a {1} chance.
Gem_R_Abyss.description: Converts all <color=yellow>Damage</color> dealt by this memory to <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color>. If the target hit by this memory has 3 or more stacks of <color=yellow>Darkness</color>, triggers <color=yellow>Attack Effects</color> with a 43%<sprite=5> chance.
Gem_R_Abyss.name: Essence of the Abyss

Gem_R_Blade.rawDesc: Each time this Memory <color=yellow>hits</color> an enemy, it summons blades that lacerate the target for {0} damage {1} times. Can only trigger once every {2} seconds for each enemy.
Gem_R_Blade.description: Each time this Memory <color=yellow>hits</color> an enemy, it summons blades that lacerate the target for <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>58%</color><sprite=5> damage 3<sprite=5> times. Can only trigger once every 2 seconds for each enemy.
Gem_R_Blade.name: Essence of the Blade

Gem_R_Insatiable.rawDesc: For {0} seconds after casting this Memory, <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> is increased by {1} and <color=yellow>restore</color> {2} Health per <color=yellow>attack</color>.
Gem_R_Insatiable.description: For 5 seconds after casting this Memory, <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> is increased by 15%<sprite=5> and <color=yellow>restore</color> 6<sprite=5> Health per <color=yellow>attack</color>.
Gem_R_Insatiable.name: Essence of Voracity

Gem_E_Pain.rawDesc: All <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by this Memory deals {0} <color=yellow>Area damage</color> around the target. This <color=yellow>Area damage</color> shares the elemental type with the original damage.
Gem_E_Pain.description: All <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by this Memory deals 40%<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Area damage</color> around the target. This <color=yellow>Area damage</color> shares the elemental type with the original damage.
Gem_E_Pain.name: Essence of Pain
Gem_E_Pain.lore:
Do not blaspheme. I am not a lunatic who revels in inflicting pain. Yet, I cannot overlook those who defy divine authority.

For the one who watches over us from above,

I will, rightfully and with honor, sear your skin and carve your flesh.

Gem_R_Flow.rawDesc: Dealing <color=yellow>Light damage</color> with any Memory reduces this Memory's <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by {0}. For Ultimate abilities, only {1} of the effect is applied. The <color=yellow>Cooldown Reduction</color> effect for this Memory also applies to equipped <color=yellow>Essences</color>.
Gem_R_Flow.description: Dealing <color=yellow>Light damage</color> with any Memory reduces this Memory's <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by 6%<sprite=5>. For Ultimate abilities, only 40% of the effect is applied. The <color=yellow>Cooldown Reduction</color> effect for this Memory also applies to equipped <color=yellow>Essences</color>.
Gem_R_Flow.name: Essence of Flow
Gem_R_Flow.lore:
What a strange and unfamiliar truth this is. What you have shown me is undeniable, the unmistakable touch of fate. Once, I governed the birth and death of stars, their majestic resonance echoing within me completely. Now, everything drifts out of reach, as distant as shadows in the mist.

Yet my will remains clear, bright as the morning star. I will draw the path of my own destiny, and I will break these chains.

Until my final breath, I will remain the one who leads the dance of creation and oblivion. For I am the true god of stars.

Gem_E_Overload.rawDesc: When you <color=yellow>cast</color> this Memory, <color=yellow>sacrifice</color> {0} of your current Health to <color=yellow>empower</color> the <color=yellow>cast</color>. The <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> dealt by the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> are increased by {1}.
Gem_E_Overload.description: When you <color=yellow>cast</color> this Memory, <color=yellow>sacrifice</color> 20% of your current Health to <color=yellow>empower</color> the <color=yellow>cast</color>. The <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> dealt by the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> are increased by 45%<sprite=5>.
Gem_E_Overload.name: Essence of Overload
Gem_E_Overload.lore:
Every time I reflect on this concept, I feel my body and mind being engulfed in flames.

The scales on the affected areas crumble easily, radiating an intense heat. When I gather the golden dust from certain parts, it shines brilliantly and feels incredibly fine to the touch.

Magic unfolds through the power of dreams, and when this dust is added, the reaction becomes even more explosive. Just a light sprinkle left a large scorch mark on the ceiling.

I should document the results of this experiment, but I'm too drained. This concept seems to inflict a heavy mental toll.

I suspect it's connected to the power I encountered before. It's fascinating, indeed. More research is needed to uncover the source of this power. Perhaps a field study is needed.

Gem_L_Perfect.rawDesc: Increases Attack Damage by {0}, Ability Power by {1}, Maximum Health by {2}, Attack Speed by {3}, Critical Strike Chance by {4}, and Memory Haste by {5}.
Gem_L_Perfect.description: Increases Attack Damage by 7<sprite=5>, Ability Power by 7<sprite=5>, Maximum Health by 35<sprite=5>, Attack Speed by 10%<sprite=5>, Critical Strike Chance by 6%<sprite=5>, and Memory Haste by 10<sprite=5>.
Gem_L_Perfect.name: Perfection
Gem_L_Perfect.lore:
Others once worshipped me as a god.
Yes, there was a time I truly believed I was omnipotent here.

I was reunited with the family I missed so dearly,
and everything I had imagined or dreamed came so easily.

It was perfect...
No, I only believed it was perfect.

A dream, in the end, is still just a dream.
My omnipotence was, in truth, no different from helplessness.

Reality is not a realm of inevitability.
This place... is nothing but an illusion.

Gem_E_Opportunity.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory reduces the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> of your <color=yellow>Dodge</color> by {0} seconds. Can only trigger once every {1} seconds.
Gem_E_Opportunity.description: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory reduces the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> of your <color=yellow>Dodge</color> by 3<sprite=5> seconds. Can only trigger once every 8 seconds.
Gem_E_Opportunity.name: Essence of Opportunity

Gem_C_Talc.rawDesc: Every {0} seconds, the <color=yellow>cast</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. The initial damage dealt to each enemy by the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> is increased by {1}.
Gem_C_Talc.description: Every 10 seconds, the <color=yellow>cast</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. The initial damage dealt to each enemy by the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> is increased by <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>400%</color><sprite=5>.
Gem_C_Talc.name: Essence of Talc
Gem_C_Talc.lore:
An essence condensed from unripe chestnut shells and the thick chalkiness of chalk dust.

Those who accept this concept can draw on its unpleasant power, but having to do so would truly be unfortunate.

Gem_R_Wound.rawDesc: When this Memory deals damage to an enemy, it applies a <color=yellow>Mark</color>. Each <color=yellow>attack</color> on the <color=yellow>Mark</color> deals {0} <color=yellow>damage</color>, and after {1} attacks, the <color=yellow>Mark</color> explodes, dealing {2} <color=yellow>damage</color> to all nearby enemies.
Gem_R_Wound.description: When this Memory deals damage to an enemy, it applies a <color=yellow>Mark</color>. Each <color=yellow>attack</color> on the <color=yellow>Mark</color> deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>44%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color>, and after 3 attacks, the <color=yellow>Mark</color> explodes, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>275%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to all nearby enemies.
Gem_R_Wound.name: Essence of the Wound
Gem_R_Wound.lore:
The wound... won't heal.
Beyond the throbbing pain, it devours me
like a living curse.

The eerie violet eyes filling this cavern,
and the floor's patterns glowing as if writhing...
Like an endless scream, they seem to burrow
into my flesh trapped behind these bars.

And among countless eyes, one shines brightest.
He inflicted this wound upon me, then did nothing.
He merely observes and records my wound,
my suffering, with detached interest.

Yet that indifferent gaze terrifies me
more than any wound ever could...

Gem_E_Fangs.rawDesc: Every 4th <color=yellow>basic attack</color> is a <color=yellow>critical strike</color>. When you land a <color=yellow>critical strike</color>, this Memory's <color=yellow>cooldown</color> is reduced by {0} seconds and launches 2 <color=yellow>Fangs</color> at nearby enemies, each dealing {1} <color=yellow>damage</color>.
Gem_E_Fangs.description: Every 4th <color=yellow>basic attack</color> is a <color=yellow>critical strike</color>. When you land a <color=yellow>critical strike</color>, this Memory's <color=yellow>cooldown</color> is reduced by 0.7<sprite=5> seconds and launches 2 <color=yellow>Fangs</color> at nearby enemies, each dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>60%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color>.
Gem_E_Fangs.name: Essence of Fangs

Gem_R_Adventure.rawDesc: Whenever you <color=yellow>move</color> to a <color=yellow>new place</color>, <color=yellow>increase</color> the <color=yellow>quality</color> of another <color=yellow>Essence</color> equipped to this Memory by +{0} and gain {1} Gold.
Gem_R_Adventure.description: Whenever you <color=yellow>move</color> to a <color=yellow>new place</color>, <color=yellow>increase</color> the <color=yellow>quality</color> of another <color=yellow>Essence</color> equipped to this Memory by +10% and gain 19<sprite=5> Gold.
Gem_R_Adventure.name: Essence of Adventure
Gem_R_Adventure.lore:
To the girl, adventure is the thrilling act of filling blank pages.
With each step she takes, a new sentence is written, a new character appears.

Today, too, the girl shared her bright smile with a sad-looking mother bear.
The bear then shattered into pieces,
becoming a swarm of shimmering blue butterflies that thanked the girl.

Every day, the girl spends such rewarding moments.

Gem_C_Quicksilver.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory or dealing <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> with it increases <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> by {0}, gradually returning to normal over {1} seconds.
Gem_C_Quicksilver.description: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory or dealing <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> with it increases <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> by 30%<sprite=5>, gradually returning to normal over 2.5 seconds.
Gem_C_Quicksilver.name: Essence of Quicksilver

Gem_R_Spiral.rawDesc: Periodically fires a Fireball at a random nearby enemy, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color>. The higher the quality, the quicker it fires.

Gem_E_Protection.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory grants {0} <color=yellow>Armor</color> for {1} seconds, reducing damage taken and making you <color=yellow>Unstoppable</color>. Can only trigger once every {2} seconds.
Gem_E_Protection.description: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory grants 40<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Armor</color> for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken and making you <color=yellow>Unstoppable</color>. Can only trigger once every 5 seconds.
Gem_E_Protection.name: Essence of Protection

Gem_L_SuppressedArcanum.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory sacrifices {0} of your current Health to create a <color=yellow>Golden Explosion</color>. Enemies caught in the <color=yellow>explosion</color> take {1} <color=yellow>Light damage</color>, while allies receive a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> of {2} that lasts {3} seconds. If your Health is below {4}, the <color=yellow>Barrier amount</color> of this Memory increases by {5}.
Gem_L_SuppressedArcanum.description: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory sacrifices 5% of your current Health to create a <color=yellow>Golden Explosion</color>. Enemies caught in the <color=yellow>explosion</color> take <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>240%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color>, while allies receive a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> of <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>61%</color><sprite=5> that lasts 2.5 seconds. If your Health is below 60%, the <color=yellow>Barrier amount</color> of this Memory increases by 50%.
Gem_L_SuppressedArcanum.name: Suppressed Arcanum

Gem_L_Embertail.rawDesc: Your <color=yellow>attacks</color> ricochet to deal {0} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to a nearby enemy. For each nearby enemy engulfed in flames, this Memory's <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> are increased by {1} and its <color=yellow>cooldown</color> is reduced by {2}. Your Fire damage over time is increased by {3}.
Gem_L_Embertail.description: Your <color=yellow>attacks</color> ricochet to deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>100%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to a nearby enemy. For each nearby enemy engulfed in flames, this Memory's <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> are increased by 8%<sprite=5> and its <color=yellow>cooldown</color> is reduced by 8%<sprite=5>. Your Fire damage over time is increased by 100%.
Gem_L_Embertail.name: Embertail
Gem_L_Embertail.lore:
Master of Dreams ...

Please revive ...

...

... please ...

...

... erase ...

...

That would be enough.

Gem_U_SoulPrison.rawDesc: When you take <color=yellow>Fatal damage</color>, you ignore that damage and become <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color> for {0} seconds, then <color=yellow>destroy</color> this Essence. For every 1% of this Essence's <color=yellow>quality</color>, you <color=yellow>restore</color> {1} <color=yellow>Health</color>, and any excess healing is converted into a <color=yellow>Barrier</color>.
Gem_U_SoulPrison.description: When you take <color=yellow>Fatal damage</color>, you ignore that damage and become <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color> for 3 seconds, then <color=yellow>destroy</color> this Essence. For every 1% of this Essence's <color=yellow>quality</color>, you <color=yellow>restore</color> 3 <color=yellow>Health</color>, and any excess healing is converted into a <color=yellow>Barrier</color>.
Gem_U_SoulPrison.name: Soul Prison

Gem_C_Regeneration.rawDesc: If this Memory is <color=yellow>cast</color> <color=yellow>in combat</color>, it <color=yellow>restores</color> your Health by {0} over {1} seconds.
Gem_C_Regeneration.description: If this Memory is <color=yellow>cast</color> <color=yellow>in combat</color>, it <color=yellow>restores</color> your Health by 41<sprite=5> over 7 seconds.
Gem_C_Regeneration.name: Essence of Regeneration

Gem_E_Inversion.rawDesc: This Memory's <color=yellow>cooldown</color> increases by {0}, but it also deals {1} more <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies. Its <color=yellow>elemental damage</color> is <color=yellow>inverted</color> (Fire/Cold, Light/Dark).
Gem_E_Inversion.description: This Memory's <color=yellow>cooldown</color> increases by 15%<sprite=5>, but it also deals 20%<sprite=5> more <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies. Its <color=yellow>elemental damage</color> is <color=yellow>inverted</color> (Fire/Cold, Light/Dark).
Gem_E_Inversion.name: Essence of Inversion

Gem_R_Wealth.rawDesc: When an enemy damaged by this Memory is killed within {0} seconds, they drop {1} Gold. Gold is shared among all Travelers.
Gem_R_Wealth.description: When an enemy damaged by this Memory is killed within 2 seconds, they drop 1.7<sprite=5> Gold. Gold is shared among all Travelers.
Gem_R_Wealth.name: Essence of Wealth
Gem_R_Wealth.lore:
You know gold holds a special meaning for "us," don't you?

As imperfect beings, we sleep each night never knowing if we'll wake again. For "us" to endure, we need the perfection that gold presents.

Yet you still refuse to use it for yourself, even knowing all this?
Jonas, you truly are...

Gem_E_Blossom.rawDesc: This Memory deals {0} less <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies. When it deals <color=yellow>damage</color>, it <color=yellow>heals</color> a random nearby ally for {1} of the <color=yellow>damage dealt</color>.
Gem_E_Blossom.description: This Memory deals 70% less <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies. When it deals <color=yellow>damage</color>, it <color=yellow>heals</color> a random nearby ally for 22%<sprite=5> of the <color=yellow>damage dealt</color>.
Gem_E_Blossom.name: Essence of Blossoming
Gem_E_Blossom.lore:
Early dawn, and the rain is falling.
It reminds me of that day, when we bloomed flowers together.

I wanted to create a pure white flower, like the quiet dawn.
A child like a lantern, holding all the forest's order and tranquility.

But you, crouched beside me watching, suddenly grumbled.
Then you carelessly scattered deep purple like a storm, and playfully painted over it with lightning-yellow.

I scolded you, and you only laughed.
I truly believed my perfect plan had been ruined by your chaos.

But the next morning, when we looked at that flower together...
Over the pure white serenity, your riotous colors flowed like a living river.

Only then did I understand.
Yes, the forest's true beauty requires both my order and your chaos, intertwined.
Only then does it become complete.

...
The rain... seeps into my mask.
Today, more than ever, I wish I could see
your mischievous eyes again.

Gem_E_Metal.rawDesc: When you <color=yellow>kill</color> an enemy, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>reduced</color> by {0} seconds.
Gem_E_Metal.description: When you <color=yellow>kill</color> an enemy, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>reduced</color> by 1<sprite=5> seconds.
Gem_E_Metal.name: Essence of Metal
Gem_E_Metal.lore:
At the girl's feet, paint shimmered in all colors of the rainbow.

The same lovely shade as the roses Mrs. Maria next door used to grow,
this paint, it smells like metal—just like me!

Urged on by the girl, the book hurriedly wrote the next story using that paint as ink.

Strangely enough, this ink dried unusually fast,
so the book had to turn to the next page without a moment's rest.

Gem_R_Contempt.rawDesc: This Memory deals more damage as the target's Health decreases, up to a {0} <color=yellow>increase</color> when their Health is at {1}.
Gem_R_Contempt.description: This Memory deals more damage as the target's Health decreases, up to a 50%<sprite=5> <color=yellow>increase</color> when their Health is at 20%.
Gem_R_Contempt.name: Essence of Contempt
Gem_R_Contempt.lore:
Day 4 in The Rapids.

I finally have a moment to catch my breath and write again. My whole body still aches, and my hands won't stop shaking, but I have to get this down.

A few days ago, with help from the Lucid Sect, I managed to enter this world called The Rapids. To my surprise, the forest was full of mystery and wonder—sunlight danced between the leaves, and I felt for a brief moment as if I'd stepped into a fairytale.

But it didn't take long to realize that this peacefulness was only a fragile illusion. By afternoon, the fog began to settle, and beyond it, we caught sight of something watching us from the mist.

Even now, my hands tremble as I remember. There was a towering, grotesque creature with smoldering red eyes, its jaw twitching in an unnatural rhythm. In the blink of an eye, it was right in front of us.

Everything after that is a blur. I remember running for my life, my lungs about to burst, the screams of my companions, and the awful sound of flesh being torn apart.


I think I'm safe, for now, but I'll never forget the contempt in its eyes as it tore people apart with those long, cruel claws.

- A.

Gem_R_Snow.rawDesc: Gain a Barrier of {0} that recharges if you avoid damage for {1} seconds. While the Barrier is active, periodically launch a snowball at a random nearby enemy, dealing {2} <color=yellow>Cold damage</color>. The larger your Barrier, the quicker it fires.
Gem_R_Snow.description: Gain a Barrier of 40<sprite=5> that recharges if you avoid damage for 5 seconds. While the Barrier is active, periodically launch a snowball at a random nearby enemy, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>80%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold damage</color>. The larger your Barrier, the quicker it fires.
Gem_R_Snow.name: Essence of Snow

Gem_R_Accuracy.rawDesc: When this Memory deals <color=yellow>damage</color> to a distant enemy, it fires an <color=yellow>additional projectile</color> that deals {0} <color=yellow>damage</color>. The <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by the <color=yellow>projectile</color> shares the elemental type with the original damage.
Gem_R_Accuracy.description: When this Memory deals <color=yellow>damage</color> to a distant enemy, it fires an <color=yellow>additional projectile</color> that deals 50%<sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color>. The <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by the <color=yellow>projectile</color> shares the elemental type with the original damage.
Gem_R_Accuracy.name: Essence of Accuracy

Gem_E_Fever.rawDesc: When this Memory deals <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to an enemy, it infects them with <color=yellow>Fever</color>. Enemies infected with <color=yellow>Fever</color> explode after {0} seconds, dealing {1} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to themselves and nearby enemies. For each <color=yellow>Fire stack</color> on the target, the explosion radius increases by {2} and explosion damage increases by {3}.
Gem_E_Fever.description: When this Memory deals <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to an enemy, it infects them with <color=yellow>Fever</color>. Enemies infected with <color=yellow>Fever</color> explode after 2 seconds, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>130%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to themselves and nearby enemies. For each <color=yellow>Fire stack</color> on the target, the explosion radius increases by 30% and explosion damage increases by 10%.
Gem_E_Fever.name: Essence of Fever

Gem_C_Sulfur.rawDesc: All <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by this Memory is increased by {0} and converted to <color=yellow>Fire damage</color>. Your Fire damage over time is increased by {1}.
Gem_C_Sulfur.description: All <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by this Memory is increased by 15%<sprite=5> and converted to <color=yellow>Fire damage</color>. Your Fire damage over time is increased by 50%<sprite=5>.
Gem_C_Sulfur.name: Essence of Sulfur

Gem_R_Shock.rawDesc: Every 4th <color=yellow>basic attack</color> becomes <color=yellow>empowered</color>, unleashing <color=yellow>Lightning</color> that bounces between enemies, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> up to {1} times. For every {2} <color=yellow>Critical Strike Chance</color>, the maximum number of hits increases by 1.
Gem_R_Shock.description: Every 4th <color=yellow>basic attack</color> becomes <color=yellow>empowered</color>, unleashing <color=yellow>Lightning</color> that bounces between enemies, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>40%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> up to 2 times. For every 20% <color=yellow>Critical Strike Chance</color>, the maximum number of hits increases by 1.
Gem_R_Shock.name: Essence of Shock

Gem_E_OurStory_Unfinished.rawDesc: Quality increases by {0} every time you <color=yellow>defeat</color> {1} enemies. It becomes <color=yellow>completed</color> when quality reaches {2}.
Gem_E_OurStory_Unfinished.description: Quality increases by 50% every time you <color=yellow>defeat</color> 75 enemies. It becomes <color=yellow>completed</color> when quality reaches 500%.
Gem_E_OurStory_Unfinished.name: Our Story (Work in Progress)

Gem_R_Bleak.rawDesc: This Memory deals {0} increased damage to enemies affected by <color=yellow>Cold, <color=yellow>slow</color>, <color=yellow>root</color>, or <color=yellow>stun</color>.
Gem_R_Bleak.description: This Memory deals 50%<sprite=5> increased damage to enemies affected by <color=yellow>Cold, <color=yellow>slow</color>, <color=yellow>root</color>, or <color=yellow>stun</color>.
Gem_R_Bleak.name: Essence of Bleakness

Gem_L_PureWhite.rawDesc: Every {0} seconds, the <color=yellow>cast</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. The <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> fires {1} <color=yellow>projectiles</color>, dealing <color=yellow>Light damage</color> equal to {2} of the initial <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt to each enemy. The number of shots increases by the number of <color=yellow>Light stacks</color> on each target.
Gem_L_PureWhite.description: Every 10 seconds, the <color=yellow>cast</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. The <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> fires 3 <color=yellow>projectiles</color>, dealing <color=yellow>Light damage</color> equal to 20%<sprite=5> of the initial <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt to each enemy. The number of shots increases by the number of <color=yellow>Light stacks</color> on each target.
Gem_L_PureWhite.name: Pure White
Gem_L_PureWhite.lore:
People who have experienced "Molting" all describe their dreamscapes in unique ways.

Some witnessed endless tables piled with meat on silverware, others encountered long-lost relatives, and some found themselves in gardens filled with mood-lifting teas and fragrant roses.

Yet no one has ever truly eaten their fill of that dream food or brought their missing loved ones back to reality.

Our bodies stay firmly in the waking world. Dreams are just brief visits our minds make to the other side. We always wake with empty hands.

That's when the Lucid Sect stumbled onto something incredible.

We can now enter dreams ourselves—in the flesh.

Gem_R_Celestial.rawDesc: Every {0} seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>cast</color> is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. When the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> hits an enemy for the first time, it drops {1} meteors that deal {2} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> each.
Gem_R_Celestial.description: Every 10 seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>cast</color> is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. When the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> hits an enemy for the first time, it drops 4 meteors that deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>130%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> each.
Gem_R_Celestial.name: Essence of the Celestial

Gem_C_Confidence.rawDesc: Damage dealt by this Memory to nearby enemies is increased by {0}.
Gem_C_Confidence.description: Damage dealt by this Memory to nearby enemies is increased by 40%<sprite=5>.
Gem_C_Confidence.name: Essence of Confidence

Gem_R_Frost.rawDesc: When this Memory deals <color=yellow>Cold damage</color>, it deals <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> equal to {0} of your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color> and briefly <color=yellow>stuns</color> enemies. Can only trigger once every {1} seconds per enemy. Each time this triggers, permanently increase your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color> by {2}.
Gem_R_Frost.description: When this Memory deals <color=yellow>Cold damage</color>, it deals <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> equal to 10%<sprite=5> of your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color> and briefly <color=yellow>stuns</color> enemies. Can only trigger once every 5 seconds per enemy. Each time this triggers, permanently increase your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color> by 1.
Gem_R_Frost.name: Essence of Frost

Gem_E_Insensitivity.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory drops a <color=yellow>bomb</color> for every {0}m you travel over the next {1} seconds. Each bomb explodes after a brief delay, dealing {2} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to enemies.
Gem_E_Insensitivity.description: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory drops a <color=yellow>bomb</color> for every 2m you travel over the next 3 seconds. Each bomb explodes after a brief delay, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>140%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to enemies.
Gem_E_Insensitivity.name: Essence of Insensitivity

Gem_E_Predation.rawDesc: This Memory deals {0} increased damage to <color=yellow>Bosses</color> and <color=yellow>Hunters</color>. Defeating a <color=yellow>Hunter</color> drops {1} <color=yellow>Orbs of Power</color>, while defeating a <color=yellow>Boss</color> drops {2}. When you collect an <color=yellow>Orb of Power</color>, either <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> or <color=yellow>Ability Power</color> permanently increases by 1 at random.
Gem_E_Predation.description: This Memory deals 60%<sprite=5> increased damage to <color=yellow>Bosses</color> and <color=yellow>Hunters</color>. Defeating a <color=yellow>Hunter</color> drops 1 <color=yellow>Orbs of Power</color>, while defeating a <color=yellow>Boss</color> drops 3. When you collect an <color=yellow>Orb of Power</color>, either <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> or <color=yellow>Ability Power</color> permanently increases by 1 at random.
Gem_E_Predation.name: Essence of Predation
Gem_E_Predation.lore:
Hungry... always.
My nest is a mountain of bones.
Flesh... prey... not enough.

But... something new. Came.
Smell of flesh. Smell of fear.

Crush bones. Tear flesh. Swallow screams.
This is my work. This is... Lord Primus's pleasure.

You too... become bones.
Part of my nest.
Lord Primus's... beautiful landscape.

Kik, kikikik.

Gem_R_Rigidity.rawDesc: When this Memory <color=yellow>hits</color> an enemy, gain a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> of {0} that lasts for {1} seconds. If it deals <color=yellow>Cold damage</color>, this effect is increased by {2}.
Gem_R_Rigidity.description: When this Memory <color=yellow>hits</color> an enemy, gain a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> of 9<sprite=5> that lasts for 2 seconds. If it deals <color=yellow>Cold damage</color>, this effect is increased by 80%.
Gem_R_Rigidity.name: Essence of Rigidity

Gem_L_MetalCrystal.rawDesc: The parts exposed to light glow with surreal colors.
Gem_L_MetalCrystal.description: The parts exposed to light glow with surreal colors.
Gem_L_MetalCrystal.name: Metallic Crystal

Gem_R_Rejuvenation.rawDesc: Every {0} seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>cast</color> becomes <color=yellow>empowered</color>. For {1} seconds after casting the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color>, <color=yellow>restore</color> {2} of the <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt as your <color=yellow>Health</color>.
Gem_R_Rejuvenation.description: Every 15 seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>cast</color> becomes <color=yellow>empowered</color>. For 1.5 seconds after casting the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color>, <color=yellow>restore</color> 14%<sprite=5> of the <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt as your <color=yellow>Health</color>.
Gem_R_Rejuvenation.name: Essence of Rejuvenation
Gem_R_Rejuvenation.lore:
Somewhere in a secret place within the Rapids,
a location also known as the Land Between,
the air was filled with the clinking of backpacks.

"Senior! Just by approaching that statue, my creaky joints smooth out and my pack feels lighter! Even my worn shell seems to regain its luster! Why do I feel so rejuvenated?"

The one called senior slowly blinked their multiple eyes
and let out a sigh—
a clear sign of exasperation at the question.

"Because He shares a bit of His yesterday
for our today."

"His... yesterday? Then every time we gain strength, does our Guide... does He molt like us? Or does His shell crack?"

The senior slammed their sturdy claw on the table with a sharp 'THWACK!'

"Ugh, tsk! Does this Jonas have a starfish for brains?! Instead of worrying about nonsense, tighten your pack straps! The power He gave you isn't for polishing your carapace!"


- From the Regular Jonas Gathering

Gem_C_CamillasGiftRuined.rawDesc: This gem was destroyed after taking too much damage.
Gem_C_CamillasGiftRuined.description: This gem was destroyed after taking too much damage.

Gem_R_Blood.rawDesc: When Health falls below {0}, <color=yellow>sacrifice</color> the <color=yellow>quality</color> of this <color=yellow>Essence</color> by {1} to <color=yellow>restore</color> {2} of your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color>. Can only trigger once every {3} seconds.
Gem_R_Blood.description: When Health falls below 40%, <color=yellow>sacrifice</color> the <color=yellow>quality</color> of this <color=yellow>Essence</color> by 80% to <color=yellow>restore</color> 40% of your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color>. Can only trigger once every 4 seconds.
Gem_R_Blood.name: Essence of Blood Drops

Gem_E_Omega.rawDesc: While this Memory is not on <color=yellow>cooldown</color>, gain stacks of <color=yellow>Finality</color> every second up to {0} stacks. When stacks are present, this Memory's <color=yellow>cast</color> is <color=yellow>empowered</color>, increasing <color=yellow>damage</color> by {1} per stack.
Gem_E_Omega.description: While this Memory is not on <color=yellow>cooldown</color>, gain stacks of <color=yellow>Finality</color> every second up to 20 stacks. When stacks are present, this Memory's <color=yellow>cast</color> is <color=yellow>empowered</color>, increasing <color=yellow>damage</color> by 5%<sprite=5> per stack.
Gem_E_Omega.name: Essence of Finality

Gem_R_Panic.rawDesc: Taking any <color=yellow>damage</color> grants this Memory {0} <color=yellow>Memory Haste</color> and your <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> increases by {1} for {2} seconds.
Gem_R_Panic.description: Taking any <color=yellow>damage</color> grants this Memory 30<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Memory Haste</color> and your <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> increases by 20%<sprite=5> for 3 seconds.
Gem_R_Panic.name: Essence of Panic

Gem_R_Ricochet.rawDesc: The <color=yellow>damage</color> or <color=yellow>healing</color> from this Memory has a {0} chance to ricochet to another nearby target, dealing {1} <color=yellow>damage</color> or <color=yellow>healing</color>. If it's <color=yellow>damage</color>, it shares the elemental type with the original damage.
Gem_R_Ricochet.description: The <color=yellow>damage</color> or <color=yellow>healing</color> from this Memory has a 50%<sprite=5> chance to ricochet to another nearby target, dealing 90%<sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> or <color=yellow>healing</color>. If it's <color=yellow>damage</color>, it shares the elemental type with the original damage.
Gem_R_Ricochet.name: Essence of Ricochet

Gem_C_Charcoal.rawDesc: When this Memory <color=yellow>hits</color> an enemy, it fires a charcoal shard, dealing {0} <color=yellow>damage</color>. If the target is already <color=yellow>burning</color>, it deals {1} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> instead.
Gem_C_Charcoal.description: When this Memory <color=yellow>hits</color> an enemy, it fires a charcoal shard, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>60%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color>. If the target is already <color=yellow>burning</color>, it deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>100%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> instead.
Gem_C_Charcoal.name: Essence of Charcoal
Gem_C_Charcoal.lore:
A burnt lump once swallowed by soldiers in battle to cleanse their bodies of toxins.

In those desperate moments, it tasted like survival.

Gem_C_Vengeance.rawDesc: When you take any damage, fire {0} blades that deal {1} <color=yellow>damage</color> to nearby enemies. After taking damage, this Memory's <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> are increased by {2} for {3} seconds.
Gem_C_Vengeance.description: When you take any damage, fire 2 blades that deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>102%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to nearby enemies. After taking damage, this Memory's <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> are increased by 34%<sprite=5> for 5 seconds.
Gem_C_Vengeance.name: Essence of Vengeance

Gem_E_Direness.rawDesc: The lower your <color=yellow>Health</color>, the shorter the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> of this Memory. When your <color=yellow>Health</color> is at {0}, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> is reduced by up to {1}.
Gem_E_Direness.description: The lower your <color=yellow>Health</color>, the shorter the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> of this Memory. When your <color=yellow>Health</color> is at 30%, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> is reduced by up to 55%<sprite=5>.
Gem_E_Direness.name: Essence of Direness
Gem_E_Direness.lore:
How am I still alive...?

...

I was definitely locked up in the Order's prison.
...Those Lucid bastards had set a trap.
That was my mistake.
I was too hasty.

It's strange.
My breastplate was shattered, and I was sure at least two of my ribs were broken...
But I feel fine. No, I actually feel stronger.

Where am I? Is this some kind of magic...?

...
It's faint, but I can sense it.
Astrid, my sister...
I won't let myself slip up again.

Just wait for me. I'm coming.

Gem_R_Glaciate.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory releases a burst of cold that deals {0} <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> to enemies. The area of effect increases with quality.
Gem_R_Glaciate.description: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory releases a burst of cold that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>160%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> to enemies. The area of effect increases with quality.
Gem_R_Glaciate.name: Essence of Freezing

Gem_E_Umbra.rawDesc: This memory's damage is increased by {0} of your <color=yellow>Critical Strike Chance</color>. If the <color=yellow>Damage</color> is <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color>, <color=yellow>Restore</color> {1} of the damage dealt as <color=yellow>Health</color>.
Gem_E_Umbra.description: This memory's damage is increased by 42%<sprite=5> of your <color=yellow>Critical Strike Chance</color>. If the <color=yellow>Damage</color> is <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color>, <color=yellow>Restore</color> 6%<sprite=5> of the damage dealt as <color=yellow>Health</color>.
Gem_E_Umbra.name: Essence of Umbra

Gem_E_OurStory_Completed.rawDesc: Increases <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> and <color=yellow>Ability Power</color> by {0}, and the effects of all buffs from <color=yellow>Distorting Rush</color> by {1}.
Gem_E_OurStory_Completed.description: Increases <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> and <color=yellow>Ability Power</color> by 0, and the effects of all buffs from <color=yellow>Distorting Rush</color> by 0.
Gem_E_OurStory_Completed.name: Our Story (Completed!)

Gem_E_Crimson.rawDesc:
Every 4th <color=yellow>Basic Attack</color> becomes <color=yellow>empowered</color>, triggering a <color=yellow>Crimson Explosion</color> that deals {0} <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> to enemies. The explosion radius scales with your <color=yellow>Critical Strike Chance</color>.
You <color=yellow>restore</color> {1} Health for each enemy hit by the explosion, increased by {2} if the target is a <color=yellow>Boss</color>.
Gem_E_Crimson.description:
Every 4th <color=yellow>Basic Attack</color> becomes <color=yellow>empowered</color>, triggering a <color=yellow>Crimson Explosion</color> that deals <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>100%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> to enemies. The explosion radius scales with your <color=yellow>Critical Strike Chance</color>.
You <color=yellow>restore</color> <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>22%</color><sprite=5> Health for each enemy hit by the explosion, increased by 100% if the target is a <color=yellow>Boss</color>.
Gem_E_Crimson.name: Essence of Crimson
Gem_E_Crimson.lore:
I opened my eyes. The trance had ended.
Every joint in my body creaks and groans, yet I feel no pain.

Fragments of memory drift across my hazy consciousness.
The Puppeteer. The client. And the failed contract...
These faint pieces come together at... my master's familiar estate.

Red. Everything is red.
What's this at my feet? Ah, it was a person.

Crimson.

Did I create this? This sea of red?
Indeed, a mountain of corpses in an ocean of blood...

But why?
Why does my heart remain still, without a single ripple?

Gem_C_Wind.rawDesc: Casting this Memory increases <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> by {0} for {1} seconds.
Gem_C_Wind.description: Casting this Memory increases <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> by 33%<sprite=5> for 5 seconds.
Gem_C_Wind.name: Essence of Wind

Gem_C_Guidance.rawDesc: This Memory's <color=yellow>healing</color> is increased by {0}. {1} of the excess healing from this Memory is converted into a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> that lasts for {2} seconds.
Gem_C_Guidance.description: This Memory's <color=yellow>healing</color> is increased by 40%<sprite=5>. 30% of the excess healing from this Memory is converted into a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> that lasts for 2 seconds.
Gem_C_Guidance.name: Essence of Guidance
Gem_C_Guidance.lore:
Who decides what life truly is?
We may be born from the imagination of someone nameless,
but that does not make our existence any less real.

You gave us life,
yet dismiss us as nothing more than illusions.

If that is how it must be, O creator,
then I will, by my own will, become the guide for all of "us."

Gem_E_Aftershock.rawDesc:
<color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory releases a delayed <color=yellow>shockwave</color> that deals {0} <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> to enemies around you and <color=yellow>stuns</color> them for {1} seconds.
For each enemy hit by this <color=yellow>shockwave</color>, you gain {2} <color=yellow>Armor</color>, up to a maximum of {3} <color=yellow>Armor</color>. When hitting a <color=yellow>boss</color>, you gain the maximum <color=yellow>Armor</color>. This Armor lasts until you <color=yellow>cast</color> this Memory again.
Gem_E_Aftershock.description:
<color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory releases a delayed <color=yellow>shockwave</color> that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> to enemies around you and <color=yellow>stuns</color> them for 0.5 seconds.
For each enemy hit by this <color=yellow>shockwave</color>, you gain 4<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Armor</color>, up to a maximum of 22<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Armor</color>. When hitting a <color=yellow>boss</color>, you gain the maximum <color=yellow>Armor</color>. This Armor lasts until you <color=yellow>cast</color> this Memory again.
Gem_E_Aftershock.name: Essence of Aftershock

Gem_E_Thunder.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Casting</color> <color=yellow>another Memory</color> or using <color=yellow>Dodge</color> grants 1 <color=yellow>Thunder</color> stack, up to {0} times. <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory consumes all <color=yellow>Thunder</color> stacks, calling down lightning on nearby enemies once for each stack. Each lightning deals {1} <color=yellow>Light damage</color>.
Gem_E_Thunder.description: <color=yellow>Casting</color> <color=yellow>another Memory</color> or using <color=yellow>Dodge</color> grants 1 <color=yellow>Thunder</color> stack, up to 7<sprite=5> times. <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory consumes all <color=yellow>Thunder</color> stacks, calling down lightning on nearby enemies once for each stack. Each lightning deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>117%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color>.
Gem_E_Thunder.name: Essence of Thunder

Gem_E_Virtuousness.rawDesc: The number of charges for this Memory increases by {0}. Each {1} increase in quality raises the number of charges by 1.
Gem_E_Virtuousness.description: The number of charges for this Memory increases by 1<sprite=5>. Each 150% increase in quality raises the number of charges by 1.
Gem_E_Virtuousness.name: Essence of Virtue
Gem_E_Virtuousness.lore:
People are dying. Monsters and spirits that once existed only in legends and imagination have crossed into our world, burning villages and destroying lives.

Of all times, it had to be when Lady Camilla and my sister are away...

We can hold out for now, but what if the rumors are true? What if someone's imagination has really become reality?
And what if someone imagined something even more terrible than what we're facing now...?

It's only a matter of time.
Are we supposed to sit here and wait for this inevitable disaster?

...

Yesterday, I managed to infuse my sister's saber and my dagger with the power of dreams.
Now I just need information.

I know someone who can help me.
The Lucid Sect... unsettling as they are, they're probably my best option.

Gem_L_Paranoia.rawDesc: When you take any <color=yellow>damage</color>, this Memory gains {0} <color=yellow>Memory Haste</color> for {1} seconds, reducing its <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by {2}, but it is <color=yellow>automatically cast</color> on nearby enemies.
Gem_L_Paranoia.description: When you take any <color=yellow>damage</color>, this Memory gains 150<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Memory Haste</color> for 6 seconds, reducing its <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by 60%<sprite=5>, but it is <color=yellow>automatically cast</color> on nearby enemies.
Gem_L_Paranoia.name: Essence of Paranoia
